author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/elden-ring-nightreign/

The light of your triumphs has only deepened the shadows. Face the Night's horrors, reborn in incandescent rage.

The Deep of Night free update for #ELDENRING #NIGHTREIGN will release today, September 10th, at 6:30 PDT

Key Features of Deep of Night:
-        Queue for battle against randomized Nightlords
-        Difficulty that increases across 5 Depths
-        Tougher enemies that drop powerful weapons with unique passives and insidious drawbacks
-        New Depths Relics that can be equipped into three new slots per Vessel

#ps5 #ps5games #ELDENRING #NIGHTREIGN is available now

Rated Mature
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Deep of Night Mode Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://playstation.com/ps-family-app

Simplified family gaming

Download PlayStation Family™ from Google Play or the App Store to keep track of your child's gaming at-a-glance. With an easy-to-use activity report, simple parental controls and real-time info direct to your phone, the PlayStation Family app takes the hassle out of parenting on PlayStation.

Easy setup - Create an account for your child with age-based parental control recommendations. Decide which games they can access, ensuring they experience only age-appropriate content.

Customizable playtime - Define when PlayStation fits into your family’s routine. Whether it’s time for homework, mealtime or bedtime, you’re in control of your child’s daily playtime.

Activity report - Get insights into your child’s gaming activity. See their online status and the game they’re currently playing plus their playtime hours from the past week. Stay engaged and make informed decisions to foster healthy play.

Real-time notifications - W
title: PlayStation Family App - Simplified family gaming

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/HB1034-PPSA31814_00-0023936831834707


Can you outlast the Onslaught? Let Them Come: Onslaught is a gritty sci-fi bullet heaven roguelite where you unleash outrageous weapons, mow down endless alien swarms, and evolve your build with every run. Play the free demo now on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 - playable on consoles for the first time! Let Them Come: Onslaught launches later this year.

From Tuatara Games, creators of the cult hit Let Them Come, this Survivors-like shooter blends fast-paced roguelite progression with explosive sci-fi action. Experiment with an arsenal of weapons — from flamethrowers to orbital strikes and beyond — and adapt your strategy to survive escalating alien onslaughts. Whether you’re a fan of Vampire Survivors, Soulstone Survivors, or retro-inspired shooters, Let Them Come: Onslaught will test your skills and keep you coming back for just one more run.

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Let Them Come: Onslaught - Demo Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012444

You thought you knew racing? Try racing with lasagna in Garfield Kart 2 - All You Can Drift, now available on PlayStation 5.

Ready to race against a real heavyweight? Garfield, Odie, Nermal, and the whole crew are at the starting line, raring to go!
Play as one of the eight cult characters from the Garfield universe, fill up your karts, customize your look, and race away at breakneck speeds. 
Take a wild ride through an unhinged universe, where there’s a surprise waiting around every turn. Pirate, western, or detective: Garfield speeds through brightly colored worlds to prove that, even in his dreams, he’s the king! 
Use shortcuts or bonus items to change the course of races and create unforgettable moments with friends through local and online multiplayer modes.

#ps5 #ps5games #garfieldkart
title: Garfield Kart 2 - All You Can Drift - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/vigor/

Brave the storm in Vigor Tempest! As the fog rolls in on the shores of the Outlands, your enemies lie in wait. Shoot first before they pull you under and emerge triumphant from the turbulent waters.

Get ready for a militarized Battle Pass, featuring camo Cosmetics that help you remain unseen so you can strike from the murky depths. The brand-new PP-19 SMG is also making waves and keeping foes at bay.

Test the depth of your skills with the new Challenge System, now featuring special event challenges. Elimination warfare is crashing onto Batterie Draug this Season as well, with four new arenas joining the fight.

Dark currents swirl around you, but submergence was never an option.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #vigor 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Vigor - Tempest Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
